column4: Heya people, I'm wondering if you can help me... For some reason unknown to me, my sudoers file has had its ownership changed from root to myself. I now can't do any admin tasks, and also cannot chown the file back to root. Any advice?
you can boot from a live CD and change the owner back to root
and then in the future, don't edit your sudoers file with a regular editor, use visudo
